document.full_text: bahrain accused a prominent activist on monday of fabricating images of a corpse on the internet and summoned him for questioning in an ongoing crackdown following pro-democracy protests the state put down by force.
document.title: bahrain accuses activist of "doctoring" corpse pictures
lines_and_colors: bahrain accused a prominent activist on monday of fabricating images of a corpse on the internet and summoned him for questioning in an ongoing crackdown following pro-democracy protests the state put down by force.
